segments.text: Speaking . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have made a reservation for my breakfast last night . But I still haven't got it . I am so hungry now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry.sir , I will check for you.what ' s your room number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine.we we'll send it to you right now .
